mapper.select: select b.id as id, s.id as "season.id", s.name as "season.name", s.year as "season.year", s.season as "season.season", s.brand as "season.brand", b.id as "band.id", b.month as "band.month", b.name as "band.name", b.sex as "band.sex", b.band_code as "band.bandCode", b.devt_type as "band.devtType", b.channel as "band.channel", b.status as "band.status", b.create_id as "band.createId", b.create_name as "band.createName", b.create_date as "band.createDate" from t_planning_band b, t_planning_season s ${ ew.customSqlSegment}
